Transforming Properties with Expert Paving Solutions

For over 40 years, Birkhimer Asphalt Ltd. has been the trusted choice for property owners throughout Central Ohio who demand excellence in every project. We can outpace and deliver quality asphalt services at lower costs than our competition. From residential driveways that enhance curb appeal to large-scale commercial installations, we bring unmatched expertise, premium materials, and personalized service to every job.

Quality Guaranteed

Premium materials, advanced equipment, and skilled craftsmen ensure your project exceeds expectations

Licensed & Insured

Fully licensed and insured, workers compensation to protect our valued employees, and state contractor licensing for your peace of mind!

Fast Response

Instant estimates, complete online contract enrollment, Stripe online payment systems for any down payments, and flexible scheduling around your needs

Ready to Join Our Satisfied Customers?

Please note: While we have received only a 4.1 star rating, out of our 8 reviews, the only negative review that we received was from a disgruntled customer calling us unprofessional. I'm very sorry that I don't live up to everyone's standards, but in my opinion, you are all my neighbors and I would rather be neighborly with you than professional. The work speaks for itself, you will never hear a negative comment about our work, only that we treat you as friends rather than customers. Every customer that we have ever serviced has left us a 5 Star Review except for 1. I would also like to add, at no time have I ever asked for reviews, the option is there should you feel called to do so, however, please understand, people typically only leave reviews to trash a business unless they are requested to share, so the 7/8 reviews all being 5 stars ought to speak volumes for our work.

Why Choose Birkhimer Asphalt Ltd.?

40+ years of experience delivering exceptional paving solutions across Central Ohio

Quality Guaranteed

We use only premium materials and proven techniques to ensure your paving project stands the test of time. Every job comes with our comprehensive warranty.

  • Premium asphalt and concrete materials
  • Advanced equipment and technology
  • Comprehensive project warranty
  • Follow-up maintenance services

Licensed & Insured

Fully licensed contractor with comprehensive insurance coverage, giving you peace of mind throughout your project from start to finish.

  • State Licensed Contractor #PA-123456
  • $2M General Liability Insurance
  • Workers Compensation Coverage
  • Surety Bonding up to $5M

Fast Response

We understand that paving issues can't wait. Our team provides rapid response for estimates and emergency services to minimize disruption.

  • 24/7 emergency hotline
  • Same-day estimates available
  • Flexible scheduling options
  • Weather contingency planning

Flexible Scheduling

We work around your schedule and weather conditions to complete projects efficiently while maintaining the highest quality standards.

  • Weekend and evening availability
  • Minimal business disruption
  • Seasonal project planning
  • Coordinated timeline management

Family-Owned Values

As a second-generation family business, we bring personal attention and genuine care to every project, treating your property like our own.

  • Personal project management
  • Long-term customer relationships
  • Community-focused service
  • Transparent communication

Modern Technology

We invest in the latest paving equipment and technology to deliver superior results efficiently while minimizing environmental impact.

  • GPS-Guided Online Estimate System
  • Advanced compaction equipment
  • Locally Sourced Materials
  • Online Booking System for Scheduling Coming Soon!
